info.description: A REST API for Tableye application
info.title: Tableye API

post.description: Authenticate a user and return access/refresh tokens
Get a new access token using refresh token
Register a new user with the provided details
Create a new casino with the input payload

get.description: Get a single casino by its ID

put.description: Update a casino with the input payload

delete.description: Delete a casino by its ID

post.description: Create a new dealer with the input payload

get.description: Get details of a dealer by ID

put.description: Update a dealer's information by ID

get.description: Get a list of game summaries with pagination

post.description: Create a new game summary with the given input data

get.description: Get details of a game summary by its ID
get.summary: Get a game summary by ID

put.description: Update a game summary with the given input data

delete.description: Delete a game summary by its ID

post.description: Create a new game with the input payload

get.description: Get details of a game by ID

put.description: Update a game's information by ID

post.description: Create a new player with the input payload

get.description: Get details of a player by ID

put.description: Update a player's information by ID

get.description: Get statistics of a player by ID
